Uses of Interface
ussr.comm.Receiver

Packages that use Receiver
ussr.comm An abstract communications model comprising transmitters, receivers, and packets. 
ussr.model An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller. 
ussr.physics.jme A physics simulation implementation based on JME (JMonkeyEngine). 
ussr.samples.atron Simulation examples based on the ATRON modular self-reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.mtran Preliminary simulations based on the M-TRAN modular self-reconfigurable robot 
ussr.samples.odin Defintion of the Odin modular, reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.white Simple and very preliminary example of a reconfigurable robot with hinge-joints at the edges. 
 

Uses of Receiver in ussr.comm
 

Classes in ussr.comm that implement Receiver
 class GenericReceiver
          An abstract implementation of the Receiver interface.
 class IRReceiver
          An infrared receiver, which in currently means that it has a spreading angle of 30 degrees.
 class RadioReceiver
          A radio omnidirectional reception device
 class WiredReceiver
          A wired receiver, is always assumed to be in range once connected.

 boolean IRTransmitter.canSendTo(Receiver receiver)
           
 void PacketReceivedObserver.packetReceived(Receiver device)
          Notification method called by a receiver to which this observer has been subscribed whenever a packet arrives
